title: My Face
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR110L
description: My Face takes a close-up look at the features of a little girl's face. The photographs encourage picture-to-text connections, as well as opportunities to discuss the ways in which people are alike and different.
